thread.title: One-of-a-Kind: Cricketers who played only one Test match for India

author: newsr.in
title: One-of-a-Kind: Cricketers who played only one Test match for India
text:
Today we celebrate the birth anniversary of former Indian cricketer Arvind Apte. On this occasion, we take a look at the list of Indian cricketers who played just one Test match for their country.*Arvind Apte*
Runs - 15, Highest - 8, Average - 7.50
Lall Singh
Runs - 44, Highest - 29, Average - 22.00
Laxmidas Jai
Runs - ... Â»
